Mineshaft

by Nioreh

Released Feb 4, 2012
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM (sha-1: 69c1c7849aefdf93c84d403f2297b7641d24c7fb)

Description

In this homebrew release you must slowly descend down a mineshaft as if you rush to the bottom, you will die.
